As 2025 comes to an end, we’re revisiting some of the biggest updates and key developments in Google Play this year. It all reflects our commitment to making Google Play a rewarding platform for our developer community.

Significant updates to the store to improve discoverability and user engagement.

Collaborative efforts and new policies that help make Play a more secure and trustworthy ecosystem for users and developers.
